H0.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. New York

H1.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. Fort Duquesne

H3.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. CA-QC

A4.text: He was killed at the Battle of the Plains of Abraham in Quebec.
